diplomas.title: M.Sc. in Industrial Engineering & Logistics Management
B.Sc. in Mathematics & Applied Mathematics | Second Major: Business Administration

experience.title: Project Manager for an AI fashion platform
responsibilities: Initiative & funding stewardship: Proactively identified the Hong Kong Government Innovation and Technology Fund (ITF) opportunity; worked with corporate sponsor FashionTech to prepare and submit the application; helped secure HKD 5 - 6M and managed the project end-to-end with 100% sponsor fund disbursement and on-time reporting.

Academia-industry delivery: Turned Computer Vision (CV) / Machine Learning (ML) research into engineered outputs; assist in completing prototype design and ship two Minimum Viable Products (MVPs); achieved pilot readiness with designers and tailors.

Leadership & execution: Lead a 15-person cross-functional team (CV/ML, Apple iOS, web, 3D, User Experience (UX)); set Objectives and Key Results (OKRs) and roadmap; remove blockers and released on schedule.

Technical rigor: Built Machine Learning Operations (MLOps) and Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery (CI/CD); defined data/annotation standards and evaluation metrics; continuously reduce error and latency.

Product loop & governance: Authored Product Requirements Documents (PRDs) and user stories; run usability tests with designers/tailors; prioritized backlog from interviews; coordinated design-to-manufacturing hand-offs; align Intellectual Property (IP), privacy compliance to reduce delivery risk.

experience.title: Technical Lead
responsibilities: Managed team of 8 developers across multiple projects

Reduced technical debt by 40% through strategic refactoring
Implemented agile methodologies improving team productivity
